data.comment: The match has started, with Cercle Brugge kicking-off.
The match has started, with Cercle Brugge kicking-off.
Hans Vanaken is on target to give Club Brugge a 1-0 advantage.
The second half is underway in Bruges - Club Brugge with the kick-off.
Goal! Krepin Diatta extends Club Brugge's lead to 2-0.
Cercle Brugge make their first substitution with Lyle Foster replacing Marton Eppel.
Bernd Storck (Cercle Brugge) is making a second substitution, with Kylian Hazard replacing Kevin Hoggas.
Godfred Donsah is replacing Lassana Coulibaly for Cercle Brugge at Jan Breydel Stadium.
The home team have replaced Charles De Ketelaere with Michael Krmencik. This is the first substitution made today by Philippe Clement.
The match has come to a close in Bruges. The final score is 2-1.
